鏾鏾鏾

鏾字的基本解释

鏾
sǎn
弩。
弩机松弛。

鏾
xiàn
阄割（雄鸡）：“（郭师孔）以鏾鸡为贺礼。”

鏾
sà
化学元素“钐”的旧译。

鏾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiàn］
［《篇海》先諫切］
阉割雄鸡的睾丸。
[②]［sǎn］
［《廣韻》蘇旱切，上旱，心。］
(1)弩机松弛。
(2)妇女首饰之一种。

鏾字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏾； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1321第22
【廣韻】蘇旱切【集韻】顙旱切，?音散。弩牙緩也。　又【集韻】先旰切，音繖。弩也。　又【正字通】一說弩無鏾名，鏾音線。今俗雄雞去勢謂之鏾，與宦牛、閹豬、騸馬義同。郭師孔誤書鏾作線，說見謇齋瑣綴錄，舊註音散，非。臞仙肘後經作鐓，雞鏾亦俗增也。

鏾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鏾字的起名意思

暂无。

鏾
Basic explanation of words
鏾
sǎn
crossbow.
The crossbow machine is slack.
鏾
xiàn
Lottery (rooster): "(Guo Shikong) takes the chicken as a gift."
鏾
sà
The old translation of the chemical element "Samarium".
鏾
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiàn］
["Pianhai" first advises and cuts]
Castration of the testicles of the rooster.
[②]［sǎn］
["Guangyun" Su drought cuts, drought, heart. ]
(1) The crossbow machine is slack.
(2) A type of women's jewelry.
鏾
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鏾; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1321 Page 22
[Guang Yun] Su Han cut [Ji Yun] Dry cut in Qi, with loose sound. The crossbow teeth are also slow.　[Jiyun] First cut, sound umbrella. Crossbow also.　[Zhengzitong] It is said that the crossbow has no name but the sound line. The castration of male roosters today is called 鏾, which is synonymous with eunuchs, steers, and gelding horses. Guo Shikong mistakenly wrote the line, said Jian Zhai Suo Zhuo, the old phonetic notation is scattered, not. After the elbow of the immortal elbow is used for upsetting, the chicken feast is also increased.

鏾
Name meaning
Nothing.
xiàn, sà
I sà сущ.
уст., хим. самарий (Sm)

холостить петуха
